summary: Implemented a new weighted keyword-based gameKind detector with shooter-precedence and wired it into the Game generation flow with (per summary) a detected-kind display and a manual override that is passed into generation. However, many unrelated auth/routing/error-handling changes also appear in the diff summary and were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified authentication and profile setup UX (RequireAuth guard, LoginButton behavior, ProfileSetupModal) unrelated to game prompt fidelity.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on improving game prompt intent detection and adding detected-kind explanation + manual override in the Game flow; it does not request auth/profile UX changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified routing and viewer/library pages (downloaded-creation viewer route, MyCreationsPage, CreationViewerPage, SharedViewerPage) unrelated to game prompt fidelity.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; scope is limited to game prompt detection and override UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Extended non-game prompt generation logic (e.g., calculator/scientific calculator intent detection) unrelated to game prompt fidelity requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only concerns gameKind detection/override for Creation Type = Game.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad defensive error-handling/React Query behavior changes across backend operations unrelated to requested game prompt fidelity improvements.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of REQ-1/REQ-2 acceptance criteria.
